# userInput

**Instance Property**

Text to match, during user input, to provide appropriate output to a text document from the document text value in the same lexicon entry.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var userInput: String { get }
```

## Accessing a lexicon entry

- **documentText**: Text to be inserted into a text input object by a custom keyboard, corresponding to the user input value in the same lexicon entry.
